name: pathly-monorepo
description: Monorepo para el juego Pathly - Frontend, Backend y Generador de Niveles

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:generator" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:generator: cd generator && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup:generator: cd generator && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
